main event: A bright white round object was observed between Claremore and Tulsa, Okla. on July 4, 1952.
interesting points: The object had a diameter of up to 40 feet.,The observation lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes.,The object exhibited straight and rapid flight before stopping abruptly.,The report is classified as 'visual' observation.,The conclusion of the report mentions it might be 'X'.
